verses.text: Now these \add be\add* the \w last|strong="H0314"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w David|strong="H1732"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w said|strong="H5002"\w*, and the \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \add who was\add* raised \w up|strong="H6965"\w* on \w high|strong="H5920"\w*, the \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and the \w sweet|strong="H5273"\w* \w psalmist|strong="H2158"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w said|strong="H5002"\w*,
The \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* by me, and his \w word|strong="H4405"\w* \add was\add* in my \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*.

The \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, the \w Rock|strong="H6697"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* to me, He that \w ruleth|strong="H4910"\w* over \w men|strong="H0120"\w* \add must be\add* \w just|strong="H6662"\w*, \w ruling|strong="H4910"\w* in the \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 23.3 \ft He…: or, Be thou ruler, etc\f*

And \add he shall be\add* as the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* of the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \add when\add* the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w riseth|strong="H2224"\w*, \add even\add* a \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w*; \add as\add* the tender \w grass|strong="H1877"\w* \add springing\add* out of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* by clear \w shining|strong="H5051"\w* after \w rain|strong="H4306"\w*.

Although my \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \add be\add* not so with \w God|strong="H0410"\w*; yet he hath \w made|strong="H7760"\w* with me an \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, \w ordered|strong="H6186"\w* in all \add things\add*, and \w sure|strong="H8104"\w*: for \add this is\add* all my \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*, and all \add my\add* \w desire|strong="H2656"\w*, although he make \add it\add* not to \w grow|strong="H6779"\w*.

¶ But \add the sons\add* of \w Belial|strong="H1100"\w* \add shall be\add* all of them as \w thorns|strong="H6975"\w* thrust \w away|strong="H5074"\w*, because they cannot be \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* with \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*:

But the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add that\add* shall \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* them must be \w fenced|strong="H4390"\w* with \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* and the \w staff|strong="H6086"\w* of a \w spear|strong="H2595"\w*; and they shall be \w utterly|strong="H8313"\w* \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* in the \add same\add* \w place|strong="H7675"\w*.\f + \fr 23.7 \ft fenced: Heb. filled\f*

¶ These \add be\add* the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* whom \w David|strong="H1732"\w* had: The \w Tachmonite|strong="H8461"\w* that \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w seat|strong="H7675"\w*, \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* among the \w captains|strong="H7991"\w*; the same \add was\add* \w Adino|strong="H5722"\w* the \w Eznite|strong="H6112"\w*: \add he lift up his spear\add* against \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, whom he \w slew|strong="H2491"\w* at \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w time|strong="H6471"\w*.\f + \fr 23.8 \ft The Tachmonite…: or, Joshebbassebet the Tachmonite, head of the three\f*\f + \fr 23.8 \ft whom he…: Heb. slain\f*\f + \fr 23.8 \ft 1ch 11:11 he lift…: from whom he…: Heb. slain\f*

And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him \add was\add* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dodo|strong="H1734"\w* the \w Ahohite|strong="H0266"\w*, \add one\add* of the \w three|strong="H7969"\w* mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* with \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, when they \w defied|strong="H2778"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \add that\add* were there gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, and the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* were gone \w away|strong="H5927"\w*:

He \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w until|strong="H3588"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* was \w weary|strong="H3021"\w*, and his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w clave|strong="H1692"\w* unto the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w victory|strong="H8668"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him only to \w spoil|strong="H6584"\w*.

And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him \add was\add* \w Shammah|strong="H8048"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Agee|strong="H0089"\w* the \w Hararite|strong="H2043"\w*. And the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* were gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w* into a \w troop|strong="H2416"\w*, where was a \w piece|strong="H2513"\w* of \w ground|strong="H7704"\w* \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w lentiles|strong="H5742"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.\f + \fr 23.11 \ft into…: or, for foraging\f*

But he \w stood|strong="H3320"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w ground|strong="H2513"\w*, and \w defended|strong="H5337"\w* it, and \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w victory|strong="H8668"\w*.

And \w three|strong="H7969"\w* of the \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* went \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w* in the harvest \w time|strong="H7105"\w* unto the \w cave|strong="H4631"\w* of \w Adullam|strong="H5725"\w*: and the \w troop|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Rephaim|strong="H7497"\w*.\f + \fr 23.13 \ft three…: or, the three captains over the thirty\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \add was\add* then in an \w hold|strong="H4686"\w*, and the \w garrison|strong="H4673"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \add was\add* then \add in\add* \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w longed|strong="H0183"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Oh that one would give me \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* of the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w well|strong="H0953"\w* of \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*, which \add is\add* by the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*!

And the \w three|strong="H7969"\w* mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* brake \w through|strong="H1234"\w* the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and \w drew|strong="H7579"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* out of the \w well|strong="H0953"\w* of \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*, that \add was\add* by the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \add it\add*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \add it\add* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: nevertheless he \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* thereof, but poured it \w out|strong="H5258"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Be it \w far|strong="H2486"\w* from me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that I should \w do|strong="H6213"\w* this: \add is not this\add* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that \w went|strong="H1980"\w* in jeopardy of their \w lives|strong="H5315"\w*? therefore he \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* it. These things \w did|strong="H6213"\w* these \w three|strong="H7969"\w* mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w*.

And \w Abishai|strong="H0052"\w*, the \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* of \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w*, was \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* among \w three|strong="H7992"\w*. And he lifted \w up|strong="H5782"\w* his \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* against \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, \add and\add* \w slew|strong="H2491"\w* \add them\add*, and had the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* among \w three|strong="H7969"\w*.\f + \fr 23.18 \ft and slew them: Heb. slain\f*

Was he not most \w honourable|strong="H3513"\w* of \w three|strong="H7969"\w*? therefore he was their \w captain|strong="H8269"\w*: howbeit he \w attained|strong="H0935"\w* not unto the \add first\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w*.

And \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of a \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, of \w Kabzeel|strong="H6909"\w*, who had done \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w acts|strong="H6467"\w*, he \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* lionlike \w men|strong="H0739"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*: he went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* also and \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of a \w pit|strong="H0953"\w* in \w time|strong="H3117"\w* of \w snow|strong="H7950"\w*:\f + \fr 23.20 \ft who…: Heb. great of acts\f*\f + \fr 23.20 \ft lionlike…: Heb. lion of God\f*

And he \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* an \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w*, a \w goodly|strong="H4758"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*: and the \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w* had a \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; but he went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to him with a \w staff|strong="H7626"\w*, and \w plucked|strong="H1497"\w* the \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* out of the \w Egyptian’s|strong="H4713"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* him with his own \w spear|strong="H2595"\w*.\f + \fr 23.21 \ft a goodly…: Heb. a man of countenance, or, sight: also called, a man of great stature\f*

These \add things\add* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w*, and had the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* among \w three|strong="H7969"\w* mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w*.

He was more \w honourable|strong="H3513"\w* than the \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w*, but he \w attained|strong="H0935"\w* not to the \add first\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w*. And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* him over his \w guard|strong="H4928"\w*.\f + \fr 23.23 \ft more…: or, honourable among the thirty\f*\f + \fr 23.23 \ft guard: or, council: Heb. at his command\f*

\w Asahel|strong="H6214"\w* the \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* of \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \add was\add* one of the \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w*; \w Elhanan|strong="H0445"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dodo|strong="H1734"\w* of \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*,
\w Shammah|strong="H8048"\w* the \w Harodite|strong="H2733"\w*, \w Elika|strong="H0470"\w* the \w Harodite|strong="H2733"\w*,
\w Helez|strong="H2503"\w* the \w Paltite|strong="H6407"\w*, \w Ira|strong="H5896"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ikkesh|strong="H6142"\w* the \w Tekoite|strong="H8621"\w*,
\w Abiezer|strong="H0044"\w* the \w Anethothite|strong="H6069"\w*, \w Mebunnai|strong="H4012"\w* the \w Hushathite|strong="H2843"\w*,
\w Zalmon|strong="H6756"\w* the \w Ahohite|strong="H0266"\w*, \w Maharai|strong="H4121"\w* the \w Netophathite|strong="H5200"\w*,

\w Heleb|strong="H2460"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Baanah|strong="H1196"\w*, a \w Netophathite|strong="H5200"\w*, \w Ittai|strong="H0863"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ribai|strong="H7380"\w* out of \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*,

\w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* the \w Pirathonite|strong="H6553"\w*, \w Hiddai|strong="H1914"\w* of the \w brooks|strong="H5158"\w* of \w Gaash|strong="H1608"\w*,\f + \fr 23.30 \ft brooks: or, valleys\f*
\w Abi-albon|strong="H0045"\w* the \w Arbathite|strong="H6164"\w*, \w Azmaveth|strong="H5820"\w* the \w Barhumite|strong="H1273"\w*,
\w Eliahba|strong="H0455"\w* the \w Shaalbonite|strong="H8170"\w*, of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jashen|strong="H3464"\w*, \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*,
\w Shammah|strong="H8048"\w* the \w Hararite|strong="H2043"\w*, \w Ahiam|strong="H0279"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Sharar|strong="H8325"\w* the \w Hararite|strong="H2043"\w*,

\w Eliphelet|strong="H0467"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahasbai|strong="H0308"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w Maachathite|strong="H4602"\w*, \w Eliam|strong="H0463"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahithophel|strong="H0302"\w* the \w Gilonite|strong="H1526"\w*,
\w Hezrai|strong="H2695"\w* the \w Carmelite|strong="H3761"\w*, \w Paarai|strong="H6474"\w* the \w Arbite|strong="H0701"\w*,
\w Igal|strong="H3008"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* of \w Zobah|strong="H6678"\w*, \w Bani|strong="H1137"\w* the \w Gadite|strong="H1425"\w*,

\w Zelek|strong="H6768"\w* the \w Ammonite|strong="H5984"\w*, \w Naharai|strong="H5171"\w* the \w Beerothite|strong="H0886"\w*, \w armourbearer|strong="H5375"\w* to \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w*,
\w Ira|strong="H5896"\w* an \w Ithrite|strong="H3505"\w*, \w Gareb|strong="H1619"\w* an \w Ithrite|strong="H3505"\w*,
\w Uriah|strong="H0223"\w* the \w Hittite|strong="H2850"\w*: \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* in all.
